amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in the Congressional Record to change the effective date to be the date the Secretary submits a certification to Congress that the price of gasoline and diesel fuel will not increase in any Petroleum Administration for Defense District.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to change the effective date to be the date the Secretary submits a certification to Congress that the price of gasoline and diesel fuel will not increase in any Petroleum Administration for Defense District.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 43).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Soto.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 43).
